Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back VANCOUVER BIKE TOUR SAVE $896 PER COUPLE Vancouver Sheraton Vancouver Wall Centre &vert; Return flights • 4 nights • Vancouver Small Group Bike Tour Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Sheraton Vancouver Wall Centre The Sheraton Vancouver Wall Centre is a modern, upscale hotel in downtown Vancouver. Located in the iconic One Wall Centre, it offers stylish rooms, an indoor pool, fitness center, and on-site dining—perfect for both business and leisure travellers. Vancouver Bike Tour with Stanley Park Begin your bike tour in central Vancouver. Meet your guide, and receive a quick safety briefing before setting off on two wheels. Along the way, stop for great photo ops, get insider tips and learn insider stories about Vancouver’s colourful history from your guide. Head to Stanley Park with your small group and wind through the remarkable 1,000-acre (405-hectare) green space for splendid vistas of the city skyline, the North Shore Mountains and Mount Baker (on a clear day). Next, head over to Granville Island. Here, enjoy free time to stroll explore the Public Market—bursting with colourful produce and artisan goods—and grab lunch (own expense). Then head along False Creek, through Olympic Village for stunning views of Vancouver's skyline. Your tour concludes with a trip through Chinatown and then ambient Gastown, the city’s historic logging outpost turned chic shopping and entertainment district. Arrive back at the bike rental shop by mid-afternoon. View more View less 4 nights + flights & sightseeing from $ 2729 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand VANCOUVER BIKE TOUR SAVE $896 PER COUPLE Enquire now Sale Period : Until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Vancouver Add $150 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport 4 nights accommodation 1 x Vancouver Small Group Bike Tour with Stanley Park Tour per person Travel Dates From $2729 per person share twin Select Travel Dates Between: 20 Jan-25 Mar 26 From $3459 per person share twin Select Travel Dates Between: 13 Apr-31 May 26 From $3709 per person share twin Select Travel Dates Between: 01 Aug-22 Sep 26 NOTE: Our packages are based on dynamic pricing which means you get the best available rates of the day at the time of booking. Pricing is subject to current availability and pricing may change without notice. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out. • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Pricing is based on dynamic pricing which means you get the best available rates of the day at the time of booking. Pricing is subject to current availability and pricing may change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Advertised packages are based on Return Economy Class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Vancouver. Flights from Wellington and Christchurch are via Auckland. Flights from Wellington and Christchurch go via Auckland. A $30 one-way per person surcharge applies to outbound travel to Vancouver on Friday-Sunday and inbound travel to New Zealand on a Thursday-Saturday. • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
